title: EPIC-009: DTOs - Request/Response Models

epic.title: Shared Utilities & DTOs
epic.goal: Implement shared code: Pydantic DTOs for API contracts, custom exception hierarchy, common utilities (date formatting, token counting, retry decorators)

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Request DTOs: CreateDialogRequest, ChatRequest, AdminTopUpRequest, SetLimitRequest
Response DTOs: DialogResponse, MessageResponse, TokenBalanceResponse, UserStatsResponse, AdminStatsResponse
Exclude internal fields from responses (e.g., hashed secrets, internal IDs)
Conversion helpers: ORM entity -> response DTO
description: Define Pydantic models for all API requests and responses, separate from ORM models, implement serialization helpers.
